name: com.fusedvr.vrstreaming
description: This VR Streaming Package contains a minimal SDK & prefabs to implement VR Streaming (CloudXR) using WebRTC and Unity Remote Rendering

samples.description: Example of HDRP Streaming to VR. Requires HDRP Unity Package
Example of VRTK Integration with VR Render Streaming to highlight using input
Example of Asymmetrical Multiplayer in Apartment sample scene. 2D players can WASD, while VR players can teleport
Example on using the Blockchain Components of the Project to interact with Web3
Example on using the Blockchain Components of the Project to authenticate User Ownership with Web3

author: Vasanth Mohan <fusedarvr@gmail.com> (https://www.fusedvr.com)
